name: Extreme Jogging
description:
Find the prospect of jogging for miles and miles mind-numbingly dull and boring?

Maybe you would prefer to take your jogs down the centre of a highway or through a field of rampaging bovines while taking an occasional swim through shark infested waters?

Then look no further! This is "Extreme Jogging"!

Compete on the global leaderboard across 10 action packed stages in this auto-run platformer-style jogging game.

Get Auto Updates With The itch.io App

We recommend installing the itch.io app (https://itch.io/app) and then installing the game through that. Doing this will provide auto updates whenever a new version of the game is available. Alternatively you can use the direct downloads below, however these will not auto update.
